scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run sass-compile" "npm run js-compile" -- "watch 'npm run sass-compile' 'npm run js-compile' ./assets/src"
scripts.sass-compile: concurrently "node-sass assets/src/scss/front-styles.scss assets/css/front-styles.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass assets/src/scss/mail.scss assets/css/mail.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass assets/src/admin/admin.scss assets/css/admin.css --output-style compressed" "node-sass assets/src/scss/onboarding/main.scss assets/css/onboarding.min.css --output-style compressed"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch" "npm run sass-compile"  "npm run js-compile"
